author: Elena Pereira
comment: A wonderful little watch face that changes throughout the day. Only complaint is that one or two frames of the day-night cycle are a little boring, such as the very last frame of the van leaving where you can only see its back half.
title: Adorable stop motion

author: Renwick D'Souza
comment: I really love this watch face... Buy I wish the dimmed face had just the time (text)... There is a slight gradient in the background, which causes those pixels (in led displays) to remain on potentially reducing battery life... A case of aesthetics vs practicality...
title: Love it but...

author: Neil Piper
comment: My only issue is the notifications and the date clash in ambient mode. It could be cool with the (very recent) 1.3 update if you could re-trigger the animation. One of the best faces for moto 360.
title: Wonderful watch face

author: Vineet Kumar
comment: I love the hand-scrawled look of the time on the idle screen. It would probably be my favorite just for that, but the little background stories are cute too.

author: Andy Pham
comment: I keep coming back to Un Petit Monde as the watch face for my Moto 360. There's just something about looking into the watch and seeing a tiny world living on your watch screen. The stop-motion animations are nice, and it's very cool to have different scenes depending on the time of day. Would love for new scenarios every day! I would be more than happy to support the development of this watch face.
title: Very attractive, fun watch face.

author: Jeremiah Bostick
comment: The last update was in December 2014. There are only a few scenes. I was hoping for more but as it's been so long since the app was updated we probably won't get any more scenes.
title: Nice face but needs update

author: Dave Cassar
comment: I've tried a lot of watch faces on my Sony Smartwatch 3 and none have been as simply beautiful as this.
title: New favourite

author: John Bailey
comment: Looks pretty good except that the animations are a little choppy and haphazard but overall pretty nice. Was a pain in the rear to get it to show up on my watch, had to disconnect and reconnect it a few times.

author: Angga Kramadibrata
comment: I love it apart from one thing. The date isn't visible if there is half a notification covering the bottom half if the screen.
title: Beautiful but flawed

author: Josh McGraw
comment: I really like these little scenes. I love the font of the time as well. I also noticed that my battery lasts quite a while with this face.
title: Great Watch Face

author: Jeffrey Yu
comment: Excellent theme and style. Could use a few more variations and play the animations a few more times in case you missed it the first time.
title: Loved it!

author: Arjun Chhabra
comment: This has been my daily driver for over two months, and in that time, I haven't been able to find a watch face better than this.
title: Brilliant.

author: Joe Katon
comment: It is a really nice look face. I like a little bit of motion and change in the background. Nice touch. Clever art concept with a nice modern feel.
title: Really clever

author: Jeremy Tkaczyk
comment: When I first got the Moto 360 I wanted it to still look like a normal time piece, until I have this a try.
title: Looks great

author: Joshua Rothe
comment: I just downloaded the watch face for my moto 360 sport, and I would absolutely love it, except for the fact that when in ambient mode, the date and notifications are displayed on top of one another. You can't read the text for either. It's a simple fix, the date could be moved above the time, and it wouldn't clash.
title: It's great but...

author: Tivas Laursen
comment: Love this little thing. Beautiful pictures, nice little story. I hope that there will be more themes at some point. I would pay for that.
title: This is great!

author: Mitchell Bergesen
comment: This is just a great simple watch face that tells a story. This is my daily watch face, I keep coming back to it because I love it so much. Thanks! On my moto360.
title: I love it!

author: Matthias Götzke
comment: With new watches such as the Huawei the battery life is so good it could show the full watch face all the time.
title: Cool but no option to disable glance mode

author: William Pomeroy
comment: So cool looking! Reminds me of the old I spy books I used to read growing up. I like to look at my watch just to see the beautiful picture.
title: Love this face

author: Max Sergeyenko
comment: I wish there were more faces like this one... Or more animations more "stories" etc
title: Most stylish, minimalistic, but at the same time usable watch face!

author: Corrine Johnson
comment: The watch face is a little bit of fun thoughout the day. The photos are beautiful and the design is simple and elegant. I recommend this delightful watch face that puts a smile on anyone's face 😊
title: Gorgeous

author: Matthew Wilson
comment: Crashes on my Moto 360, unusable.
title: Crashes Before Even Loading

author: Filip Gruszczyński
comment: I wish it added some weather indicator above the time and it would be perfect.
title: Beautiful watch face

author: Bas Schilders
comment: Love this watchface, it keeps surprising every time I see it. Nice soft light in sleep mode and great motion and colours in live mode.
title: My living watchface

author: William Garrison
comment: A cute change of pace in watch faces. Includes a nice low-bit ambient mode.

author: Timothy White
comment: Concept is great. Would love a few more scenes throughout the week

author: Kevin Webber
comment: The best watch face.  Every time you take a look at your watch you get a nice peaceful feeling.
title: Nice high quality looking photos.

author: Rejane F
comment: Love the little animation, particularly the night time one with the camp tent. I wish the afternoon/day background was more than the current "desert"
title: Cute watchface

author: Timothy Smith
comment: This is my favorite free watch face at the moment. I love how the image changes with the time of day.
title: Great on G Watch

author: Kathi Sharp
comment: Includes just the necessary information. Clean, spare design. Avoids the flat tire issue.
title: Spare and beautiful

author: Tomáš Kletzander
comment: Crashes instantly on LG GWatch R

author: Daniel T
comment: Best concept design, always comes back to if after installing a new face,
title: Favorite

author: Andrew Velez
comment: I would have given this app an A+ but the screen shots show the weather icon option above the time but there isn't an option to place it.  :-\
title: A but no plus sign becuase...

author: Sergey Zadyraka
comment: This watch face inspire me every day. I dreaming about my next trip then I see it.
title: Inspiration

author: Olle Lindell
comment: Wish there was a new scenario every day...
title: Need more

author: David Gilroy
comment: Love to see the changes through the day. This face is fun and make you smile.
title: Fun and functional

author: Cesar Nogueira
comment: Why does it have to dim? I want an option to have this always visible.
title: Why can't we have this face anyways on?

author: Carlos M Rivas
comment: Would not open.. Can't get to sync between my Note4 and my SamsuGear2 Watch...
title: Doesn't run in my Gear2..

author: HUSAIN HASAN
comment: I can't use it for my moto 360
title: Moto 360

author: Manish Manohar
comment: Doesn't sync with moto 360 2nd version with Android wear 2
